messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Pears, was Attacks and such
messages.msgSnippet: I still have a few, alot aren t even ripe yet so hopefully will be before the first frost! I ll take the peach recipe :) Did you see the pear ideas/recipes
messages.messageBody:
I still have a few, alot aren't even ripe yet so hopefully will be before
the first frost! I'll take the peach recipe :) Did you see the pear
ideas/recipes Lynda had? Sounded nummy :)
Indiana Tami

"You must be the change you wish to see in the world"
~Ghandi

Try out this fun site!
http://www.neopets.com/refer.phtml?username=angel1bunny

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Pears, was Attacks and such
messages.msgSnippet: Tami  - Do you still have peaches?  If so I ll send you the habanero recipe. And I ll still take any pear/peach recipes anyone has to offer :).  Silly me, only
messages.messageBody:
Tami - Do you still have peaches? If so I'll send you the habanero recipe.
And I'll still take any pear/peach recipes anyone has to offer :). Silly
me, only asking on the recipe list. ~Rue

-----Original Message-----
From: Tami Labig-Duquette [mailto:labigduquette@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 8:04 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Pears, was Attacks and such


Fruit leather? Ok tell me pear recipe guru how do I do this?
Rue should have asked you for pear/peach recipes :)

We make pear butter, actually it's the next thing after canning what felt
like trillions of pints of pears and cinnamon pears :) Ok so we will make
the dehydrated pears. Kids think they sound good :)
Indiana Tami

"You must be the change you wish to see in the world"
~Ghandi

Try out this fun site!
http://www.neopets.com/refer.phtml?username=angel1bunny




>From: "Lynda" <lurine@...>
>Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
>Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Pears, was Attacks and such
>Date: Wed, 12 Sep 2001 15:20:28 -0700
>
>Just ripe, not RIPE. Geez, looks like I might still rule the CAMdom <g>
>If
>they are too ripe, then whiz them in your blender and make fruit leather
>with them. Or pear butter is just too yummy!
>
>Lynda
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Tami <labigduquette@...>
>To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 2:36 PM
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Attacks and such
>
>
> > I never have! But plan on it due to your post :) didnt even think

> > they need to be ripe?
> > Indiana Tami
>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Pears, was Attacks and such
messages.msgSnippet: Fruit leather? Ok tell me pear recipe guru how do I do this? Rue should have asked you for pear/peach recipes :) We make pear butter, actually it s the next
messages.messageBody:
Fruit leather? Ok tell me pear recipe guru how do I do this?
Rue should have asked you for pear/peach recipes :)

We make pear butter, actually it's the next thing after canning what felt
like trillions of pints of pears and cinnamon pears :) Ok so we will make
the dehydrated pears. Kids think they sound good :)
Indiana Tami

"You must be the change you wish to see in the world"
~Ghandi

Try out this fun site!
http://www.neopets.com/refer.phtml?username=angel1bunny
